import React, { Component } from 'react' /* import FontAwesomeIcon from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import FontAwesomeIcon from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' */ import logo from './img/flip-logo.png' import videothumb from './img/video-thumb.png' import 'bulma/css/bulma.css' import './css/flip-careers.css' class App extends Component { render() { return (
{/* */} Join FLIP Our Culture Current Openings

FLIP Careers

Our focus is on building a team of like-minded people who will own and drive FLIP's business - work across functions and bring the vision to life.

Join FLIP

“Our focus is on building a team of like-minded people who will own and drive FLIP’s business – work across functions and bring the vision to life. If you’re looking for an organization where your efforts are noticed, your opinion matters and where you can see the difference you’re making, then read on.”

Our Culture

FLIP is not just a place of work; it’s a WAY OF LIFE! We represent India via our multi-cultural and multi-lingual team – from 16 states and speaking 12 languages. There is Unity in Diversity in our ‘Little India.’ We value every ethnicity and learn from each other. Here are the guiding principles for every FLIPian.

Our Tenets:

) } } document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { // Get all "navbar-burger" elements const $navbarBurgers = Array.prototype.slice.call( document.querySelectorAll('.navbar-burger'), 0 ) // Check if there are any navbar burgers if ($navbarBurgers.length > 0) { // Add a click event on each of them $navbarBurgers.forEach(el => { el.addEventListener('click', () => { // Get the target from the "data-target" attribute const target = el.dataset.target const $target = document.getElementById(target) // Toggle the "is-active" class on both the "navbar-burger" and the "navbar-menu" el.classList.toggle('is-active') $target.classList.toggle('is-active') }) }) } }) export default App
